'''Bovorian'''
Bovorians were winged sapients indigenous to [[Bovo Yagen]].

'''''Attribute Dice:''''' 12D
DEXTERITY 2D/5D
KNOWLEDGE 2D/5D
MECHANICAL 1D/3D
PERCEPTION 2D/5D+1
STRENGTH 2D/5D
TECHNICAL 1D/3D

'''Special Abilities:'''
''Acute Hearing:'' Bovorians have a heightened sense of hearing and can detect movement from up to a kilometer away. ''Infrared Vision:'' Bovorians can see in the infrared spectrum, giving them the abilitiy to see in complete darkness if there are heat sources. ''Claws:'' The Bovoriansâ€™ claws do STR+1D damage.

'''Move:''' 9/12
'''Size:''' 1.8-2.3 meters tall
'''Source:''' Alien Encounters (p. 33) & Wookieepedia (For the Bovorian Description)
